channel.title: 562 fixing jad
channel.description:
Ok so i'm needing the correct anim if thats the problem, When you are fighting jad he does his range anim but it does the magic attack... Any help? I checked in the NPCDefinition2745 and its all correct, were else to look? :confused: :mad:
Thanks!
